title: Did Blur Really Crash the NFT Market?
description: With prices fading, NFT traders are blaming marketplace Blur and its flipping incentives—as Blur’s founder decries “bad takes.”

title: Cardano ($ADA) Powered Algorithmic Stablecoin $DJED Loses Peg Amid Reserve Ratio Drop
description: The popular Cardano-powered algorithmic stablecoin Djed ($DJED), which is backed by nearly 40 million $ADA tokens, has lost its peg to the value of the U.S. dollar and is now trading at $1.09 across decentralized exchanges on the Cardano ecosystem. title: Filecoin Price Prediction 2023-2032: What’s the future for FIL?

title: Web3 projects lost nearly $314m in Q2, CertiK research shows
